name: Explosive
description: Has 30 HP and lasts until reduced to 0 HP. If damaged by a Fire or Lightning element Reason spell, begins a phase within Range 1 of a Fire Patch or Lightning Arc, or if an adjacent Tripwire is destroyed, destroys itself and deals lethal damage equal to (100 - Range x 25 - Prot) to all units (minimum of 0).
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
